scripts.postgres_up: cd dev && docker-compose pull && docker-compose up -d
scripts.postgres_up_regular: cd dev && docker-compose pull && docker-compose up
scripts.dev_frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm start
scripts.dev_backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.dev: npm install && export NODE_ENV=development && concurrently -t "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss" -p "{time} [{name}]" -n "react,server" "npm run dev_frontend" "npm run dev_backend"
scripts.dev_env: npm install && export NODE_ENV=development && concurrently -t "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss" -p "{time} [{name}]" -n "react,server,db" "npm run dev_frontend" "npm run dev_backend" "npm run postgres_up_regular"
scripts.deploy: export NODE_ENV=production && concurrently -t "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss" -p "{time} [{name}]" -n "react,server" "cd frontend && npm install && npm run build" "cd backend && npm install && npm run deploy"
